definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
since (a previous event)
to bring/to bring about/to produce
to come from (a place)/From: (in email header)
future/tomorrow/CL:個|个[ge4]/approaching/coming/pending
to stand up/to get up/also pr. [qi3 lai2]

(after a verb) indicating the beginning and continuation of an action or a state/indicating an upward movement (e.g. after 站[zhan4])/indicating completion/(after a perception verb, e.g. 看[kan4]) expressing preliminary judgment/also pr. [qi3 lai5]
to stand up/to get up/also pr. [qi3 lai2]

(after a verb) indicating the beginning and continuation of an action or a state/indicating an upward movement (e.g. after 站[zhan4])/indicating completion/(after a perception verb, e.g. 看[kan4]) expressing preliminary judgment/also pr. [qi3 lai5]
(after a verb, indicates coming out, completion of an action, or ability to discern or detect)
to come out/to appear/to arise
(after a verb, indicates coming out, completion of an action, or ability to discern or detect)
to come out/to appear/to arise
more and more
to come/to arrive
source (of information etc)/origin
afterwards/later
original/former/originally/formerly/at first/so, actually, as it turns out

to come down/(completed action marker)/(after verb of motion, indicates motion down and towards us, also fig.)/(indicates continuation from the past towards us)/to be harvested (of crops)/to be over (of a period of time)/to go among the masses (said of leaders)
apparently/it seems that

sentences.english: I just came from a fruit market.
sentences.chinese: 我刚从一个水果市场来。

sentences.english: McDonald's and KFC use this kind of international business strategy to make their profit.
sentences.chinese: 麦当劳和肯得及就是利用这种国际化策略来盈利的。

sentences.english: You know, Uncle Brendan, I am really glad you invited me here.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，布莱登叔叔，我真的很高兴你邀请我们来。

sentences.english: I'm using exactly the same form to reduce this.
sentences.chinese: 我用的同样的方法来减少问题的规模。

sentences.english: When I come to Shengzhou, I always stay there.
sentences.chinese: 我每次来嵊舟，都会待在那里。

sentences.english: What the little boys didn't know was that a second train was heading straight for them.
sentences.chinese: 另一列火车正朝他们驶过来，两个小男孩却浑然不知。

sentences.english: Sit down and plan out a strategy for defeating your doubt.
sentences.chinese: 坐下来然后制定一项击败怀疑的计划。

sentences.english: I can come here between seven and eight.
sentences.chinese: 我七点钟和八点钟之间能来。

sentences.english: So, combustible ice is how come from?
sentences.chinese: 那么，可燃冰是怎么来的呢？
没人生来就会使用筷子。

sentences.english: The script could be improved by displaying the picks in a Keno-style board.
sentences.chinese: 可以通过在基诺样式板中显示选择结果来改进脚本。

sentences.english: For years, the government has been buoying up cotton prices.
sentences.chinese: 多年来政府一直保持棉花高价格。

sentences.english: I think you are too busy to take an afternoon off.
sentences.chinese: 我想你们真是忙得连个下午都抽不出来了。

sentences.english: Gordimer's fiction has been the subject of much commentary in South Africa over the years.
sentences.chinese: 戈迪默的小说已多年来在南非引起了很大评论的话题。

sentences.english: Few drinks at the dinner will find us all snoozed at the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭来几杯，过会纷纷睡倒在沙发上了。

definition: to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
see 的士[di1 shi4]
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
aim/clear
really and truly
with this/thereby/thus/because of this
we/us/ourselves/our
way/manner/style/mode/pattern/CL:個|个[ge4]
can/may/possible/able to/not bad/pretty good
therefore/as a result/so/the reason why
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
unofficial variant of 瞭[liao4]
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
(of eyes) bright/clear-sighted/to understand clearly
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
old variant of 和[he2]/harmonious
surname He/Japanese (food, clothes etc)
old variant of 和[he2]
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
to be used for
this kind of/so/this way/like this/such
(used after a verb) give it a go/to do (sth for a bit to give it a try)/one time/once/in a while/all of a sudden/all at once
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
